alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 10:21AM AKST until January 29 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulation of 2 inches for a total snow accumulation of 12 to 18 inches. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Over a foot of snow has already fallen across much of Anchorage. Additional snow is expected to develop later this morning, providing for another few inches of snow. Dry / low-density flow may easily be lofted, resulting in poor visibility at times with just light wind or in turbulent areas such as highways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
